diff_hunk:
@@ -4239,24 +4239,64 @@ def test(name):

         self._test_signal_window_functions(self)
 
-    @skipIfNoLapack

         MI = torch.inverse(M)

-        self.assertFalse(MI.is_contiguous(), 'MI is contiguous')
body: I am not sure why this test was added when the `inverse` function was designed. I removed it because it caused my tests to fail.
